description: Definition for a content element in ContentCentral

id.description: ID of element. This is a UUIDv4.

slug.description: A URL friendly version of the element's name

index.description: Index of the element. This describes how elements should be ordered.

created_at.description: Date and time when this element was created. ISO 8601 compatible format.

updated_at.description: Date and time when this element was last updated. ISO 8601 compatible format.
